ygData.subject: RE: New RNG Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Sweet....not no drop though....hope the quest isn t super easy. Crafted I think is an excellent way to do mid-upper level armor quests. I like the way they did
ygData.messageBody:
Sweet....not no drop though....hope the quest isn't super easy. Crafted I
think is an excellent way to do mid-upper level armor quests. I like the way
they did it. None of the items were super easy to get (sides the guantlets,
which way WAY too easy and screwed the way they had it with the pp return
and xp).
